comments.html: Honestly, I was surprised that along the FCoE euphoria wave no one ever remembered ATA over Ethernet :) However, besides Coraid I didn't hear of any other vendor actively pushing this technology to the market. Looks like you can't sell the whole pack of DC3.0 solutions when something *that* cheap and simple is used for storage :)
comments.name: Petr Lapukhov

comments.html: Thanks for the feedback, and for the links :)
comments.name: Russell Heilling
